document_data.mainbody:
All-seeing crystal ball was a divine spell available to worshipers of Savras.
When cast, this spell allowed the caster to create a crystal ball with a diameter of . On top of having all the powers of a regular crystal ball, this spell allowed the caster to cast any divination-based spell through the ball to a target. Powerful clerics where able to embed the clairaudience, ESP or telepathy spells into the crystal ball.
In addition to somatic and verbal components, this spell required material components, a ball of snow and ice or fine sand shaped into a sphere, and the holy symbol of the caster.
